text:
Komodo Health, San Francisco/New York - Multiple Positions | Onsite | http://komodohealth.com/

We are a startup developing the world's most advanced platform for healthcare analytics. Check out our website for more details.

As a small startup, we value devops as a culture, so there will be opportunities to work with AWS and Docker for all engineering positions.

We're hiring for multiple positions:

* Full Stack Engineer (Angular -> React, Django, Postgres, Elasticsearch) - Looking for mid to senior level

* Data Engineer (Python, Scala, Spark, Airflow, Postgres) - Looking for mid level

* DevOps Engineer (AWS, Docker, Kubernetes) - Looking for mid to senior level.

Apply on our workable page (and to see our other openings) or send us an email at careers@komodohealth.com. https://komodohealth.workable.com/
